main event: A bright light, possibly metallic, was observed moving southeast for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in Kettering, Ohio on 15/02/1963., The object was recorded by Ground-Radar and was reportedly visible to the naked eye., ECHO over Dayton was detected by several stations during the incident., The observer noted the object appeared as an exceedingly bright star., The case was evaluated as a possible ECHO or Balloon.
